data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 127 believers in Trincomalee and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Trincomalee, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Trincomalee against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 11811 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 300 new simple churches in the state of Trincomalee, Sri Lanka. Place a simple church in every community of the 1,500,000 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Trincomalee, Sri Lanka to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Bania people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 127 believers in Trincomalee.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Trincomalee to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.section_summary:
the state of Trincomalee, Sri Lanka has a population of 1,500,000.

We estimate Trincomalee has 127 people who might know Jesus, 114,750 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,385,123 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 11,811 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Trincomalee, Sri Lanka humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?
